uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.model.serv

Interface ServeDataProducer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Contexed, Tagged
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    SettableServeDataProducer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AvatarServeDataProducer, DataObjectDataProducer, DynamicFormManager, PersonalResponseManager, ResponseManager, SessionDataProducer

    public interface ServeDataProducer
extends Contexed, Tagged
    Class that can produce data to be provided to the user. It is up to the implementing class how much of the path is significant when locating the data. By convention the tag ServeData should retrieve a default ServeDataProducer for the application.
     

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String DEFAULT_SERVE_DATA_TAG

      MimeStreamData getData(SessionService user, java.util.List<java.lang.String> path)
      Get a MimeStreamData corresponding to the data to be served This method also implements access control and returns null if access is denied.
      java.lang.String getDownloadName(SessionService user, java.util.List<java.lang.String> path)
      get a download file-name to be added to a download link.

    • Method Detail

      • getData

        MimeStreamData getData(SessionService user,
                       java.util.List<java.lang.String> path)
                throws java.lang.Exception
        Get a MimeStreamData corresponding to the data to be served This method also implements access control and returns null if access is denied. Note that the SessionService may not have a current person set so you have to check for null SessionService and null AppUser as well as the users permissions.
        Parameters:
        user -
        path -
        Returns:
        MimeStreamData or null
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getDownloadName

        java.lang.String getDownloadName(SessionService user,
                                 java.util.List<java.lang.String> path)
                          throws java.lang.Exception
        get a download file-name to be added to a download link. This should be the same as the value returned by MimeStreamData.getName() if getData(SessionService, List) returns a non-null value. However this method may be called by display content generation code so if the result is generated on the fly it might be possible to generate the download name in a more lightweight fashion. It should also work to always return null thought he browser will use the last part of the selection path as the download
        Parameters:
        user -
        path -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
